definitions.definition: to clean yourself, or a part of yourself, with water and usually soap:
examples: I'd like to wash before dinner.

definitions.definition: If a particular material or piece of clothing washes well, it is not damaged or spoiled by repeated washing.
the action of washing something or a part of your body:
examples: Those curtains need a good (= careful) wash.

definitions.definition: all the clothes, sheets, etc. that are washed together, especially in a washing machine:
examples: Can I put this shirt in (with) the white wash?

definitions.definition: to wash your body or a part of it:
examples: I need to have a wash before dinner

definitions.definition: to clean clothes, sheets, etc., usually in a washing machine:
examples: Are you doing a wash tonight?
